component-metadata.title: Fetches documents from an instance of Google Desktop search engine

attribute-metadata.title: Query URL
attribute-metadata.description: Installation-specific URL at which Google Desktop search service is available. On Windows machines, the URL is available at the HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Google\Google Desktop\API\search_url system registry key. Please consult Google Desktop API documents for further instructions if needed.

attribute-metadata.title: Remove query word highlighting
attribute-metadata.description: Google by default highlights query words in snippets using the bold HTML tag. Set this attribute to true to keep these highlights.
